description: A React component for attendance check-in and management, including GPS, face scan, and manual modes, along with schedule management features.

methods.name: Attendance()
methods.description: React functional component managing attendance check-in UI and logic.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission for check-in, updating status with selected mode and timestamp.

methods.name: onFaceCapture
methods.description: Handles face photo upload, reads image as data URL, and updates preview state.

methods.name: requestLocation
methods.description: Requests user's geolocation and updates notes with GPS coordinates.
